title: Sandakari Vadi Vadi Song Lyrics KadaiKutty Singam
stanzas:
Sandakkari Vadi Vadi
unna adakki aaluren
kutti potta poona pola
vattam adikka yenguren. (2)

ettu vachi neeyum pona
sokkuthadi
ettu patti rasaa pechum
thukkuthadi.

Sandakkari Vadi Vadi
unna adakki aaluren
kutti potta poona pola
vattam adikka yenguren. (2)

maththalatha pola neethan
nenjayum thatturiye
mettetuthu naanum paada
thondaiya mutturiye.

ottumoththa oorume
uchchu kottum aambala.
unna kanda aasaiyil
nippathenna roatula.

saamy sathiyama
unna vittu vazha thonala.
kadhu kuththala naan
kitta vandhu kelu thevala.

andharathil oonjal poatu
enna nee konjanume
kichu kichu mootti
naan un kannatha killanume

etti ninnu neeyume
seivathenna baavana
mandhiricha kozhiya
vetta enna yosana.

kozhi engirundhu
vandhathunnu kekum oorula.
kadhal vandha vazhi
solla ingu yaarume illa.

Sandakkari Vadi Vadi
unna adakki aaluren
kutti potta poona pola
vattam adikka yenguren. (2)

ettu vachi neeyum pona
sokkuthadi
ettu patti rasaa pechum
thukkuthadi.

Sandakkari Vadi Vadi
unna adakki aaluren
kutti potta poona pola
vattam adikka yenguren.
